articles.title: Germany changes stance on Apple-Google contact tracing project - AppleInsider
articles.description: Germany has changed its stance on Apple and Google's work to create a contact tracing system for tracking and managing the spread of COVID-19, supporting a privacy-forward decentralized approach instead of using a centralized system.
